    Interface and Description

  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.pushwoosh.BasePushMessageReceiver
    As of release 5.0.0, replaced by NotificationServiceExtension.onMessageReceived(PushMessage) in conjunction with NotificationServiceExtension.isAppOnForeground(): 
         
     public class TestNotificationServiceExtension extends NotificationServiceExtension {
         @Override
         public boolean onMessageReceived(final PushMessage message) {
             if (isAppOnForeground()) {
                 Handler mainHandler = new Handler(getApplicationContext().getMainLooper());
                 mainHandler.post(() -> {
                     handlePush(message);
                 });

                 // this indicates that notification should not be displayed
                 return true;
             }
         }

         @Override
         protected void startActivityForPushMessage(PushMessage message) {
             super.startActivityForPushMessage(message);

             handlePush(message);
         }

         @MainThread
         private void handlePush(PushMessage message) {
             // TODO: handle push message
         }
     }
    com.pushwoosh.BaseRegistrationReceiver
    As of release 5.0.0, replaced by Callback
    com.pushwoosh.fragment.PushFragment
    As of release 5.0.0, replaced by Pushwoosh
    com.pushwoosh.PushManager
    As of release 5.0.0, replaced by Pushwoosh, PushwooshBadge, PushwooshLocation, PushwooshInApp, PushwooshBeacon
